'''Frostdew Trail''' is [[Ganyu]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Ganyu's hair is at shoulder-length, styled with two locks of hair in the front at her chest, and a thick rat tail in the back with a ahoge. 

Ganyu's outfit consists of a black halternecked bodysuit and black tights with needle-like gold accents on the legs, under a white bodice with side cutouts that starts under her chest with gold trim and ends as a tailcoat with blue triangular trim, white sleeves with triangular blue trim and detached from the bodysuit, a pair of gray high heels. Her {{Cryo}} [[Vision]] rests on her left hip with a red cloverleaf knot, she wears a partially flattened bell around her neck tied by a ribbon with ''xiangyun'' motifs, under the bell is a detached triangle collar that covers her neck, and black gloves
